subject: Group Member Steve Hill and others LIVE at South Pittsburgh Haunted Hospital
author: bulletbabea
full_text:
Watching our members tonight and tomorrow night at the South Pittsburgh Hospital. Very active location. Steve Hill on now on channel 2 on ParanormalTvNetwork.com and channel 6 tomorrow night at 8pm EST. Tommy Golden, PEMA TV and many others are there for the weekend event. 

Also on tonight PZTV with Destination Truths Rex Williams, Scott Gruenwald, Mike Conner, and others as they investigate the U.S.S. Hornet in a fundraising event for this historic location. These guys work very hard to help historic sites raise money and get people involved in documenting while helping to preserve its history. Channel 3 on ParanormalTvNetwork.com 

There are alot of people out there for these events and they have a ton of equipment which they will be using to gather evp, photos, video, etcetera. So come join the fun.
